extendedInfo.description: Actually, you don't like a just drawing on the smartphone, right?Let's draw a car and a cube and anything what you want on the MalangMalang. The MalangMalang is to play with the Samsung Smart TV and make a interesting and new experience by smartphone with your all family and friends and anyone who you want. And if you want to see your drawing on your facebook wall page, you can post your drawing and show a your drawing to your friends.If you have a question or request, then send us a mail to dev@dgmit.com
